name: Hunter Biden indicted by special counsel on felony gun charges

name: 'Threats don’t matter': McCarthy taunts hardline Republicans as government shutdown approaches
description: WASHINGTON — The House appears no closer to funding the government and averting a shutdown than they were when lawmakers left over a month ago for a weeks-long August recess.

name: Arm Shares Rise as Trading Begins in Biggest IPO of the Year

name: Jimmy and Rosalynn Carter are 'coming to the end' but together and 'in love,' their grandson shares
description: Former President Jimmy Carter and former first lady Rosalynn Carter’s grandson said his grandparents remain together and in love, even as they face health challenges.

name: Alex Jones spent over $93,000 in July. Sandy Hook families who sued him have yet to see a dime

name: Luxury cruise ship pulled free days after getting stuck off Greenland's coast

name: Americans sharply divided over whether Biden acted wrongly in son's businesses, AP-NORC poll shows
